properties.name: NetbiosNameServers
properties.description: The IPv4 addresses of up to four NetBIOS name servers.

properties.name: NtpServers
properties.description: The IPv4 addresses of up to four Network Time Protocol (NTP) servers.

properties.name: DomainName
properties.description: This value is used to complete unqualified DNS hostnames.

properties.name: DomainNameServers
properties.description: The IPv4 addresses of up to four domain name servers, or AmazonProvidedDNS.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: Any tags assigned to the DHCP options set.
